pd_var_0_0: I heard that someone lives in the mountains... but who would be crazy enough to ever live away from the here and now?
pd_var_0_1: What? Who, me? Why, no, I haven't heard of Twitter, why do you ask?
pd_var_0_2: Have you heard the news about the Buttcoin stock? It crashed to an all time low today... chin up, I'm sure it will make a comeback!
pd_var_0_3: People say this island puts off a "hostile, unwelcoming" aura. Does it really, though? Or are people just looking for problems?
pd_var_0_4: This place is so beautiful..! Though, rather on the small side... The same faces seem to always pop up everywhere you go.
pd_var_0_5: I've only been here on vacation for a short time, but I don't know what I'd do if this place ever sunk into the ocean... you're lucky to have gotten a house here! If you move out, can I have it?
pd_var_0_6: The lingo people use online changes all the time... I'm too afraid to get started on something only to find out it's been out of fashion for days. Days!
pd_var_0_7: That Mayor sure is straightforward! No one seems to really question what he says much... so it must be true, right?
pd_var_0_8: There are just too many stories out there these days that exploit fictional characters. When is the Mayor going to pass a law that gives unreal people real rights?
pd_var_0_9: There's no place quite like this island, that's for sure... I have to keep up with everyone to make sure I don't miss anything important!
